events.message: I received my order last week, but I want to request a refund because the item isn't what I expected and I would like my money back.
The customer's request mentioning refund and money back has been categorized under the Refund cluster for further handling.
The case has been assigned to agent Lisa K. who specializes in refunds to address the customer's refund request promptly.
Hello! I'm Lisa from customer support. I understand you'd like a refund, and I'm here to help you with the process. Could you please provide your order number?
To proceed with your refund, please send us a photo of the product you received and your order number for verification.
Thank you for the quick response. Here is my order number 456789 and I attached photos showing the item as received, please let me know if you need anything else.
We have reviewed your order and photos. Your refund request has been approved, and the money will be credited back to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thanks so much for the prompt help and approval of my refund. I appreciate the smooth and fast resolution of my issue.
The refund has been processed and the case is now resolved. Please feel free to reach out if you have further questions.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund successfully and that everything is satisfactory with your experience.
Since your refund was successfully processed and confirmed, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
